mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ums_exchange_info
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select:
SELECT ${fieldSql} FROM ${tableName} as f, (
select substr( LISTAGG2(id,', ') WITHIN GROUP(${orderBySql}) ,1,instr( LISTAGG2(id,', ') WITHIN GROUP( ${orderBySql}),',',1,1)-1) as tid from ${tableName} where EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ums_user_info
and ${tableName}.user_id = ums_user_info.id) group by user_id )as t where f.id = t.tid

SELECT * from ums_level_info_view where is_yefg = 1 and n_present_info = 1 and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ums_user_info
and ums_level_info_view.user_id = ums_user_info.id)
